entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow in outlying areas overnight. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Blowing snow in outlying areas in the morning. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
